Content_wSideColumn.Name: Upcoming Events
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Upcoming Events
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: A list of upcoming academic exploration and employment service events.

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Virtual Visits:

Northwestern Mutual Financial Network
March 14, 2 -3 pm | MC 127C | Information Session
Website: www.northwesternmutual.com
The Northwestern Mutual Financial Network offers a personalized approach to uncovering financial solutions tailored to each client's individual needs. Financial representatives provide expert guidance and innovative solutions to help meet a client's financial goals and objectives at every life stage. They offer exclusive access to insurance products from a top-rated company, Northwestern Mutual, as well as an array of quality financial products and services available through Network subsidiaries and affiliates.

Info Sessions:

Idaho Web Marketing Meet Up Series
March 14, 2 - 3 pm | BEN 219 | Information Session
Website: http://iwmm.org/
Mike Ramsey, owner and founder of NiftyMarketing.com will be giving a presentation on Internet marketing. Mike is an alum of BYU-I and has been working in Internet marketing for 6 years. His company, NiftyMarketing.com, is a local search marketing company that helps businesses target customers in geo-focused regions using Search and Social Media. Corporate headquarters is located in Burley. Be sure to look for other Internet marketing information sessions throughout March.

Brighton Homes
March 14, 2 -3 pm | 105 AUS | Construction Seminar
Website: http://www.brightonhomes-idaho.com/
Founded in 1994, Brighton Homes has created hundreds of homes across the Treasure Valley with styles ranging from patio homes to estates. Through its expertise, attention to detail and adaptability, Brighton Homes exceeds homebuyer expectations and successfully navigates the ever-changing real estate landscape. They will be conducting interviews in the morning (see Career Navigator for details) and presenting at the Construction Seminar in the afternoon.

Navy - Nuclear Collegiate Program
March 19, 5 - 6 pm | AUS 156 | Information Session
Website: www.navy.com
Senior Chief Timothy Ledbetter will be on campus to discuss the advantages of the "Collegiate Program", where students can actually complete their Degree at BYU-I, while being on Active Duty and receiving full pay and benefits. BYU-I student, Marcus Thackeray, who is in the Collegiate Program, will also be there to speak with interested students.  BYU-I Catering will be providing pizza and drinks for the presentation. All majors are invited to attend, but the Nuclear Program is particularly good fit for engineering, physics and math students.

Café Zupas       
March 21, 2 - 3 pm | Smith 222 | Information Session
Website: www.cafezupas.com
Hosted by the College of Business and Communication. Café Zupas specializes in House-Made soups, salads and sandwiches using fresh and exotic ingredients in a fast-casual setting. They have won 15 Best-of-State awards over seven consecutive years. Zupas will be on campus to recruit marketing and advertising students for their corporate office.

Idaho Web Marketing Meet Up Series
March 21, 2 - 3 pm, BSN 219 | Information Session |
Website: http://iwmm.org/
John Broadbent, CMO of NetMark.com, will be giving a presentation on Internet marketing. John is an alum of BYU-I and has been working in Internet marketing for 3 years. NetMark.com headquarters is located in Idaho Falls, Idaho. Be sure to look for other Internet marketing information sessions throughout March.

International Connection
March 21, 5 -6 pm | MC 174 B | Information Session
Come find out about Internship possibilities in Europe!
